FuncDef:
The dns command specifies a DNS server for the current domain.
The undo dns command removes the DNS server from the current domain.
By default, a domain has no DNS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of the DNS server.
It is in the dotted decimal format and must be a valid unicast address.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Modifications about DNS server configurations take effect during next login.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
